The removable day back can be anchored on the exterior of the bag providing more packing space  or remove the shoulder straps from the main luggage and attach directly to the smaller pack for an instant day bag whenever you need! The large main compartment on the luggage feature internal mesh pockets for sorting items and compression straps for securing your items down while travelling to eliminate your clothes wrinkling.      The 17L daypack can carry a full sized laptop or a Camelback water system to help you stay hydrated while touring vacation spots (not included). JET20472-BLUE	"Lync 20"" Canadian Carry-On Convertible BackPack + Rolling Luggage_Blue"	6.67563E+11	The definition of a convertible wheeled backpack has changed with the all new Carry-On Lync luggage from Eagle Creek™! Unlike traditional wheeled backpacks  the wheels and handle system can actually be removed from the bag and disassembled to save space and weight from your back! The Lync starts with a traditional main bag that can convert into a backpack thanks to the removable  padded shoulder straps (with sternum support) - and can convert even more into a wheeled upright by quickly assembling the frame and mounting the bag to it featuring a full telescopic handle that can lock at multiple position depending on your height  rugged all terrain wheels that can navigate the road ahead  and corner and bumper guards that help protect your bag during your travels.      The large main compartment features compression straps to secure your clothes while travelling to avoid shifting and wrinkling during transit. There is a large internal mesh pocket for sorting clothes or placing a Pack-It™ folder. A large external pocket can be used for storing magazines or files and a small pocket found on the top of the bag can be used for storing commonly used travel items like your passport or travel documents. JET20473-BLUE	"Lync 22"" International Carry-On Convertible BackPack + Rolling Luggage_Blue"	6.67563E+11	The definition of a convertible wheeled backpack has changed with the all new Carry-On Lync luggage from Eagle Creek™! Unlike traditional wheeled backpacks  the wheels and handle system can actually be removed from the bag and disassembled to save space and weight from your back! The Lync starts with a traditional main bag that can convert into a backpack thanks to the removable  padded shoulder straps (with sternum support) - and can convert even more into a wheeled upright by quickly assembling the frame and mounting the bag to it featuring a full telescopic handle that can lock at multiple position depending on your height  rugged all terrain wheels that can navigate the road ahead  and corner and bumper guards that help protect your bag during your travels.      Best of all the entire system collapses into a stowable bag for easier storage at home or for bringing along with you when in need of extra packing space!      The large main compartment features compression straps to secure your clothes while travelling to avoid shifting and wrinkling during transit. There is a large internal mesh pocket for sorting clothes or placing a Pack-It™ folder. A large external pocket can be used for magazines or files and a small pocket found on the top of the bag can be used for storing commonly used travel items like your passport and travel documents. JET10104-BLUE	Men's Deviate Travel Pack 85L_Blue	6.67563E+11	Mr. Serious Backpacker meet your serious backpack - the Deviate 85L pack is a 70L main compartment bag with a removable 15L daypack. Featuring an advanced weight suspension system  padded sternum straps and a polycarbonate molded back plate help to manage the heaviest gear. Not only that  but a removable rain shield protects the entire bag during a downpour or use it a packable duffel to bring even more items home!      70L Main Bag   The Deviate features a rigid polycarbonate back plate designed to help you carry the bag for extended trips with heavy gear. The shoulder and sternum straps are padded and feature an air mesh panel to wick away moisture and keep your bag dry - there is also an opening for a Camel back style water system to help keep you cool when you need. The large main compartment has a sleeve to store a laptop or tablet and features a separate section designed for storing shoes or dirty clothes that can be opened to access the full compartment of the bag. The covering flap on the top has an additional storage pocket and helps protect the bag from rain getting in during as light rain shower - in case of a full rain storm the provided packable duffle can shield the entire bag from rain!      15L Day Pack   The removable 15L daypack is great for storing commonly used items during your trip like your tablet and passport  and makes a great day bag to explore your destination when you can unload the 70L main pack. It features an RFID blocking pocket to keep electronic thieves from stealing information stored on your credit card or passport. JET41168-BEET	Pack-It™ Specter Cube Set_Beet	6.67563E+11	These Ã¼ber-light versions of Eagle Creek's original packing cubes are made of translucent silnylon  a blend of silicone and nylon that is silky and super strong for its weight. It's also stain and water resistant  making it the fabric of choice for parachutes and tents and now  space-saving packing organizers! Use these lighter-than-air pouches to pack underwear and socks  t-shirts and pants; you name it. Its clamshell zippered opening is big enough to stuff the sac without your belongings slipping out. JET20428-BLACK	"Tarmac 22"" Expandable Upright_Black"		Tarmac has been among our best-sellers and most recommended luggage series at Jet-Setter.ca. Every few years Eagle Creek™ releases a new version with improvements and modifications and we see this as the best one yet.  The main outer pocket is large enough to easily fit a pair of shoes  a sweater and some magazines. The top outer pocket can fit a water bottle and more and includes a Coat Keeper™ for securely attaching your coat or other gear to the outside of the case. It also includes a strap to attach another bag to roll the two together. Top  bottom and side carry handles make it easy to lift and carry the Tarmac whenever necessary.   An internal Cargo Net divider of nylon cross-straps can be pulled tight to compress clothing and can be attached in 3 places  shallow in the bag  deep in the bag for intense compression or to the exterior of the bag for additional gear. Also includes a separate internal area zippered off and made of mesh for easy visibility and extra organization.  Eagle Creek's Tarmac series comes with their 'No Matter What' warranty that literally covers EVERYTHING!  Why choose the Tarmac: Similar to the Tarmac AWD Series but for someone who prefers 2 wheels and no polycarbonate materials. It's high quality  durability and functionality and extremely low weight/quality ratio combined with the 'No Matter What' warranty make it one of best values at it's price range on the market today. JET20430-BLACK	"Tarmac 28"" Expandable Upright_Black"		Tarmac has been among our best-selling luggage series at Jet-Setter.ca. Every few years Eagle Creek™ releases a new version with improvements and modifications and we see this as the best one yet.  The main outer pocket is large enough to easily fit a pair of shoes  a sweater and some magazines. JET10106-BLUE	Women's Deviate Travel Pack 85L_Eagle Light Blue		For the globetrotting woman with adventure on the mind meet your new travel companion - the Deviate 85L backpack designed specifically for women! Featuring an advanced weight suspension system  padded sternum straps and a polycarbonate molded back plate help to manage the heaviest gear. Not only that  but a removable rain shield protects the entire bag during a downpour or use it a packable duffel to bring even more items home!      70L Main Bag   The Deviate features a rigid polycarbonate back plate designed to help you carry the bag for extended trips with heavy gear. The shoulder and sternum straps are padded and feature an air mesh panel to wick away moisture and keep your bag dry - there is also an opening for a Camel back style water system to help keep you cool when you need. The large main compartment has a sleeve to store a laptop or tablet and features a separate section designed for storing shoes or dirty clothes that can be opened to access the full compartment of the bag. The covering flap on the top has an additional storage pocket and helps protect the bag from rain getting in during as light rain shower - in case of a full rain storm the provided packable duffle can shield the entire bag from rain!      15L Day Pack   The removable 15L daypack is great for storing commonly used items during your trip like your tablet and passport  and makes a great day bag to explore your destination when you can unload the 70L main pack. It features an RFID blocking pocket to keep electronic thieves from stealing information stored on your credit card or passport. JETHG0181	GoToob - 3 Pack 1.25oz. Travel Tubes		"GoToob is the civilized  smart  squeezable tube for traveling  outdoors  and more.      Typical travel bottles are hard plastic canisters that pay no attention to the human experience at hand. GoToob is made from soft yet rugged silicone  so it's easy to squeeze  and it dispenses the product right away. A special  ""no-drip"" valve helps the cap stay clean. The collar is made of two rings that unsnap from one another. The outer ring has an ID window  and the inner ring lists content indicators. Simply snap the outer ring off and back on to display ""Soap "" ""Lotion "" and more. A blank setting lets the user write in their own content indicator.      A large opening means it's easy to fill and clean your GoToob  and the small 1.25 fl. oz. size slips easily into pockets  bags  purses  and other tight spots. All GoToobs are approved for airplane carry-on  they're food-safe (FDA)  and they're 100% BPA-free and PC-free. They are also covered by a lifetime warranty.      GoToobs are recommended for shampoos  conditioners  lotions  suntan oil  liquid soaps  condiments (ketchup  cooking oil  etc.)  hand-sanitizers  body wash  toothpaste  secret sauce  magic potions  and many other low and medium viscosity fluids. Be sure to check out the compatibility page for more information about care as well as lists of non-recommended fluids by category (food  beverage  hair care  styling  skin care  and other)." JETTTM80-BLACK	Wrap & Roll Infant Carrier Arm Pad & Tummy Time Mat_Black		The Wrap  Roll serves 2 uses in 1  as an infant carrier arm pad and tummy time mat - this innovative new product and is the first of its kind. JETSG59601-1796:jetlegsbeige	Jet Legs Large_Beige		Help beat the â€œEconomy Class Syndromeâ€ by wearing Jet Legs Travel Socks! The causes are as follows:   1. Long periods of sitting with the knees bent = a reduction in the speed of bloodflow.   2. Overeating = The stomach and intestines press against the blood vessels in the groin and obstruct normal blood circulation.   3. Air pressure in the cabin of an aircraft is equivalent to that of approx. 2000 m above sea level  and therefore equal to an altitude to which most passengers are not accustomed = less pressure on the body  the effect of which can be seen  for example  by swollen feet.   4. The air in the aircraft is very dry and passengers lose a lot of moisture throught the respiratory tract and skin  in addition the oxygen content is lower = the blood becomes thicker and can form a thrombosis (blood clot)  which in the worst case can lead to a lung embolism and death.   JET LEGS Travel Socks = this increases the pressure on the legs and helps to improve the speed of bloodflow. JET517161	Mini Travel Humidifier & Aromatherapy Diffuser		Suffer from dry stuffy air no more with this portable Humidifier that uses a standard water bottle to help moisten the surrounding air. The portable size and whisper silent operation makes it easy to bring to work  school or on any trip - the included A/C adaptor powers the Humidifier so all you need is a water bottle (500 ml to 1 litre bottle recommended) and a free plug. Can also be used as an aromatherapy diffuser for creating a relaxing atmosphere in any environment. JET205-SBAG	The Scrubba - Portable Washbag		Washing your clothes on the go has never been easier or as efficient! The Scrubba™ is a pocket-size â€œwashing machineâ€ that cleans clothes in minutes! Weighing only 5 oz. (145 g)  this foldable bag features an interior flexible washboard with dimples that cleans your clothes using warm water and detergent - it's like bringing a compact washing machine on vacation! The Scrubba™ is also great for everyday applications like spot washing small or delicate items.      No matter what your vacation type may be  there are plenty of uses for the Scrubba™; washing muddy clothes when camping or trekking across mountains or cleaning undergarments and socks while staying at a hotel - the amount of uses are limitless!      To use follow these 6 simple steps:      1. Fill - Add water  cleaning liquid and clothes to the Scrubba™ wash bag (20-40% of its volume  3-4L).      2. Roll  Clip - Roll down top at least 4-5 times and clip ends.      3. Deflate - Open and squeeze valve to expel air from the Scrubba™ wash bag.      4. Rub - Press down and rub clothes against the internal flexible washboard (30 seconds for a quick traveler wash or 3 minutes for a machine quality wash). Rub gently for delicate items.      5. Rinse - Unclip and unroll the Scrubba™ wash bag's seal. Pour out the dirty water and either rinse clothes with fresh water in the wash bag or under a running tap.      6. Dry - To dry clothes quicker  wrap each garment in a towel and squeeze to remove excess moisture. Hang it to dry on a travel clothesline.      Care and Maintenance: Turn bag inside out to dry after each use. JETRFPASH	RFID Passport Shield		RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) chips are used in all US passports created after 2006 and in over 35 million credit cards.RFID chips are also usedin hotel keys; electronic gate or door keycards; and government  military and port of entry ID cards.   The technology was designed to let us bypass the standard requirements of scanning or checking in. However  electronic identity thieves have undermined the security of RFID products by devising scanners that read your personal information without you even realizing it.   Blocking13.56MHz frequencies  the standard for most credit cards and passports items such as this one have allowed individuals to protect themselves from this kind of pickpocketing. JETJPF1002-3008:lipaultblack	Weekend Shoulder Tote Bag_Black		"With its smooth durable microfiber  Lipault offers more style than you would expect from a tote or in-flight bag. They've put an emphasis on  not just style  but quick access features. Lipault's collapsible bag concept  and excellent pocket design have created a tote whose several outside pockets are easier to see into and get your hands into than other top quality bags on the market now. This will make it easier to keep on the move and stay organized. It's main pocket also includes pen slots  a notepad pocket  cell phone pocket  book pocket and key holder. JETairbus-4600:lugmarigold	Airbus_Lug Gold		This big bus takes flight with a slew of smart features to keep you organized wherever the weekend takes you. It's got lots of Lug staples  like a ventilated compartment for shoes or dirty clothes; a comfy  removable shoulder strap; a hidden water bottle pocket; a clear-coated  wipeable bottom for easy cleaning; and  of course  a luggage strap that slips over a rolling bag handle for easy transport (not that you'll need the additional luggage with this behemoth of a bag!). Then we kicked it up a notch by adding a magnetic pocket right in front for easy access to magazines  documents  or other reading materials  plus another front zip pocket with soft-lined pouches for electronics  pen holders to keep you organized  and a key fob to keep your keys in check. We didn't skimp on style either; The Airbus features our two-tone material for a sophisticated appeal. JETairbus-4600:lugplum	Airbus_Lug Plum		This big bus takes flight with a slew of smart features to keep you organized wherever the weekend takes you. It's got lots of Lug staples  like a ventilated compartment for shoes or dirty clothes; a comfy  removable shoulder strap; a hidden water bottle pocket; a clear-coated  wipeable bottom for easy cleaning; and  of course  a luggage strap that slips over a rolling bag handle for easy transport (not that you'll need the additional luggage with this behemoth of a bag!). JETPUDDLE-BLACK	Puddle Jumper Deluxe_Black		Lug has re-imagined the original Puddle Jumper with new features found in their Signature collection like the quilted pattern design and interior floral print lining while adding in a removable cosmetic pouch and side cargo pockets. JETSTOWAWAY-BLACK	Stowaway Toiletry Case_Black		Enough space for all your toiletries with room to spare! The Stowaway toiletry case features two main compartments with zip around zippers that allow the bag to opened in half to store in your luggage easier. The main case features Polyurethane zip open pockets for storing liquids without them leaking into rest of case or even worse  your luggage - in fact the entire case is lined with a polyurethane material to help keep any potential spilled liquids in! The top zip open compartment features elasticized pockets for storing brushes and other small items  while the lower half features compression straps to help squeeze in even more stuff! The bottom of the bag features a polyurethane bottom to protect against spilled liquids on the bathroom counter and the specially treated material is water repellant and easy to clean inside and out! Featuring bright  colourful prints and water repellant materials  they are perfectly suited - and sized - just for kids.      The Waddle bag is just big enough to fit a few books or a small tablet without ever worrying about weighing your kid down. The adjustable shoulder strap allows the bag to be worn by children of different ages  and can grow with them. A soft lined internal pocket keeps electronic devices safe and won't get scratched.      The Peekaboo can be attached to any bag and offers a fun travel companion for your young ones. JET15180-BLACK	Camsafe V11 Front Camera Pack_Black		Keep your camera close at hand even when wearing a full sized backpack with this clever front design camera bag with cross body shoulder straps. JET15220100-Black	Camsafe V16 Anti-Theft Camera Slingpack_Black		A picture perfect no-logo camera bag keeps your valuables protected with fast access at your hip so you don't miss a shot. The sling-back design with padded  molded EVA back support rests comfortably at your side where you can grab your camera from a secure zippered side compartment that holds most DSLR cameras (with mounted lens and room for an extra lens too).   When the modular dividers are removed from the padded main compartment and the drawstring partition opened you have a versatile and spacious travel bag perfect for extra gear. The rear zippered sleeve holds a 13â€laptop and pens  wallet and keys are stashed in the front zippered organizer pocket. If you're caught in the rain  there's a convenient water resistant cover hidden in the base pocket.   Like all Pacsafe bags  the Camsafe Venture 16 has all the anti-theft features to keep thieves out and your valuables safe  including a padded Carrysafe® shoulder strap and eXomesh® panels embedded with stainless steel wiring that resist cuts and tears. Smart zipper security™ means zipper pulls are strategically fastened to concealed clips and the dual release security buckle on the shoulder strap can be used to lock your bag to any fixed object such as a restaurant table or beach chair. Last but not least  an RFIDsafe™ blocking pocket is the place for your credit cards and passport to shield their microchips from malicious scanning devices. Shoot for the moon with this resourceful bag. JET15221-BLACK	Camsafe V17 Anti-Theft Camera Backpack_Black		Keep thieves guessing with this no-logo camera bag that keeps your valuables protected with fast access to your camera so you don't miss a shot. Based upon the extremely popular V16 slingpack  the V17 offers full back support with the dual shoulder straps and a padded  molded EVA back support that helps in reducing the weight on your back and shoulders. The advanced sling and shoot design allows you to grab your camera from a secure zippered side compartment that holds most DSLR cameras (with mounted lens and room for an extra gear and Velcro pockets for storing memory cards). A side pocket can hold a large water bottle or tripod.      When the modular dividers are removed from the padded main compartment and the drawstring partition opened you have a versatile and spacious travel bag perfect for extra gear. The rear zippered sleeve holds a 13â€ laptop or camel back water system. A front organizing pocket securely holds your wallet  keys  as well as travel documents or small accessories for your camera. If you're caught in the rain  there's a convenient water resistant cover hidden in the base pocket.      Like all Pacsafe bags  the Camsafe V17 has advanced anti-theft features to keep thieves out and your valuables safe  including a padded Carrysafe® shoulder strap and eXomesh® panels embedded with stainless steel wiring that resist cuts and tears. Smart zipper security™ means zipper pulls are strategically fastened to concealed clips and the dual release security buckle on the shoulder strap can be used to lock your bag to any fixed object such as a restaurant table or beach chair. Last but not least  an RFIDsafe™ blocking pocket is the place for your credit cards and passport to shield their microchips from malicious scanning devices. Shoot for the moon with this resourceful bag. JET15130-BLACK	CamSafe V4 Anti-Theft Compact Camera Bag_Black		Advanced anti-theft features make the V4 one of the most secure and practical ways to carry your compact mirror less camera during your next vacation. Designed for the recent mirror less compact cameras that are becoming more popular  the V4 can carry your camera with a lens attached  and still have room for another lens or additional accessories in the dedicated padded camera section.      Bring your iPad® mini or similar sized tablet with you in the padded pocket found in the main compartment that features advanced SMart Security® zippers that lock close keeping unwanted hands from reaching your gear - there is also an RFID blocking pocket in the front to eliminate your personal information being stolen from credit cards and new passports. Store a water bottle or umbrella in the expandable side pockets. A belt loop located on the back allows you to attach the bag to your waist to keep your hands free for the next shot! Not only that - but the V4 has a hidden rain cover that can be set up quickly in case of a sudden downpour.      The advanced shoulder strap system (found on all PacSafe® bags) allows you to detach the shoulder strap from the bag allowing you to anchor it around the leg of a table or chair and lock it back in place to prevent thieves from running off with your stuff when trying to have a snack or meal. As with all PacSafe® bags the shoulder straps feature a stainless steel cable running through the material to combat bag slashers from trying to cut the straps and pry your bag away. Not only that  but the water and tear resistant material is lined with PacSafe's® lightweight  incredibly strong stainless steel eXo-mesh material that stop bag slashing thieves from cutting open your bag and trying to grab what they can. JET15145-BLACK	CamSafe V6 Anti-Theft Camera Bag_Black		Advanced anti-theft features make the V6 one of the most secure and practical ways to carry your DLSR camera during your next vacation. Designed for photographers that don't want to be bogged down with equipment  the V6 is a top loading bag that securely stores your DSLR camera with a large lens attached and still have room for a small lens or accessories in the dedicated padded camera section.      Bring your iPad® mini or similar sized tablet with you in the external pocket that features the same anti-theft smart security zippers found on the main compartment that prevents unwanted hands from reaching your gear - there is also an RFID blocking pocket to eliminate your personal information being stolen from credit cards and new passports. Store a water bottle or small tripod or umbrella in the expandable side pockets. A belt loop located on the back allows you to attach the bag to your waist to keep your hands free for the next shot! Not only that - but the V6 has a hidden rain cover that can be set up quickly in case of a sudden downpour.      The advanced shoulder strap system (found on all PacSafe® bags) allows you to detach the shoulder strap from the bag allowing you to anchor it around the leg of a table or chair and lock it back in place to prevent thieves from running off with your stuff when trying to have a snack or meal. As with all PacSafe® bags the shoulder straps feature a stainless steel cable running through the material to combat bag slashers from trying to cut the straps and pry your bag away. Not only that  but the water and tear resistant material is lined with PacSafe's® lightweight  incredibly strong stainless steel eXo-mesh material that stop bag slashing thieves from cutting open your bag and trying to grab what they can. JET15105-BLACK	Camsafe VP Anti-Theft Camera Pouch		Looking for a secure way to store your new point and shoot camera? The Anti-Theft VP Camera Pouch provides the same advanced security features found on all PacSafe® bags - in a compact size perfect for your handheld camera. Don't underestimate the importance of keeping your compact camera safe - the most important souvenirs you have are on that camera  so make sure it stays with you all the way back home.      The Anti-theft zippers feature a clasp that locks them shut - preventing thieves fom reaching into the pouch and stealing your camera. The adjustable neck strap features a concealed stainless steel cable running through it to stop thieves from slashing the strap and running off with the pouch. As with all PacSafe® items  a patented lightweight stainless steel eXo-mesh cage lines the material and protects your stuff from falling out if your bag is cut open by thieves. Prefer to have your camera even closer? Use the belt loop found on the back of the pouch to run through your belt - keeping the pouch as close to your body as possible (the shoulder/neck strap hides away in Velcro pouch on the back of bag)! JET15520-CHARCOAL	Camsafe Z14 Anti-Theft Camera SlingBag_Charcoal		Advanced anti-theft features make the Z14 one of the most secure ways for the urban photographer to transport their gear. Designed for photographers that like to bring a full assortment of gear with them - the padded/configurable camera protector can fit a full sized DSLR with small lens attached  two additional telescopic lenses  battery pack and an external flash pack is just the beginning!      Be sure knowing your camera equipment is safe thanks to the advanced PacSafe® Roobar® locking system that prevents unwanted hands from reaching your gear. Bring your iPad® or tablet with you in the dedicated external padded section. Two accessory pockets with anti-theft zippers can store small items  one has a built-in RFID blocking pockets to eliminate your personal information being stolen from credit cards  new passports and there is also a chamois attached so you can always clean your lenses when needed. The single padded shoulder strap and back support provide a comfortable fit even when the bag is full and a slip pocket on the side can be used for securing a tripod down.      The advanced shoulder strap system found on all PacSafe® bags allows you to detach one shoulder strap from the bag allowing you to anchor it around the leg of a table or chair and lock it back in place to prevent thieves from running off with your stuff when trying to have a snack or meal. As with all PacSafe® bags the shoulders straps feature a stainless steel cable running through the material to combat bag slashers from trying to cut the straps and pry your bag away. Not only that  but the rugged material is lined with PacSafe's® lightweight  incredibly strong stainless steel eXo-mesh material that stop bag slashing thieves from cutting open your bag and trying to grab what they can.      Whether on the way to a local shoot or globetrotting halfway around the world your gear will be secure in the CamSafe Z14. JET15525-SLATE	Camsafe Z15 Anti-Theft Camera Sling Bag_Pacsafe Slate		When heading out to your next photo shoot have all necessary equipment on hand and easy to find with the roomy Z15 sling bag. Designed to store a full sized DLSR camera with a lens attached  additional lenses  flash pack  battery chargers/grip  even a padded tablet section for an iPad or similar sized tablet forlooking over your photos after the shoot - or for killing time while waiting for models. Store tons of accessories like memory cards  pens  files  sync cables and more in the dedicated pockets found in then main compartment and exterior pockets - there is even a chamois attached so you can always clean your lenses when needed. You can also bring along a tripod and attach it the straps on the outside of the bag. Best of all - keep all this gear secure thanks to PacSafe® advanced anti-theft features!      The main compartment gets locked down with the advanced PacSafe® Roobar® locking system that prevents unwanted hands from reaching your gear. An external accessory pocket has built-in RFID blocking pockets to eliminate your personal information being stolen from credit cards and new passports.      The advanced shoulder strap system found on all PacSafe® bags allows you to detach one shoulder strap from the bag allowing you to anchor it around the leg of a table or chair and lock it back in place to prevent thieves from running off with your stuff when trying to have a snack or meal. As with all PacSafe® bags the shoulders straps feature a stainless steel cable running through the material to combat bag slashers from trying to cut the straps and pry your bag away. Not only that  but the rugged material is lined with PacSafe's® lightweight  incredibly strong stainless steel eXo-mesh material that stop bag slashing thieves from cutting open your bag and trying to grab what they can.      Whether on the way to a local shoot or globetrotting halfway around the world your gear will be secure in the CamSafe Z15. JET15505-CHARCOAL	Camsafe Z2 Anti-Theft Compact Camera Bag_Charcoal		Keep unwanted hands off your compact camera with the advanced anti-theft features found in the Z2 Camera Bag from PacSafe®. Designed for new MirrorLess compact cameras  the Z2 can hold a camera with lens attached  and still have room for an additional lens and mini flash or charger in the configurable padded compartment.      The main compartment and external pocket feature smart security zippers that lock onto concealed clasps making it difficult for thieves to try and pry open without you noticing. The external pocket features an RFID blocking sleeve for keeping your information stored on bank cards and passports from being stolen by electronic pick pockets trying to steal your personal information. The adjustable shoulder strap can be removed an anchored around the leg of a table or chair stopping thieves from grabbing your bag and running while trying to have a snack or meal and is lined with a stainless steel cable to prevent bag slashers from cutting the strap on your bag and attempting to take your bag. The rugged material conceals PacSafe® patented eXo-mesh stainless steel cage that stop your items from falling out if your bag actually gets cut open by bag slashing thieves.      The compact bag can also fit into a larger backpack to provide a secure spot for your camera without having to carry an additional bag  or attached to a belt and worn on the hip using the belt loops on the back of the bag. JET20315-BLACK	CitySafe LS150 Anti-Theft Shoulder Bag_Black		The LS150 has a vertical design that accommodates an iPad® or similar sized tablet for the connected individual that wants the extra security of an anti-theft bag when carrying electronic gear. The front  side and bottom of the bag feature the PacSafe® patented eXomesh® wiring embedded in the fabric  preventing possible bag slashers from cutting open your bag and stealing the contents. The external pocket has room for pens  travel documents and other items you reach for often during your trip. JETPF401-Black	"Toursafe 25"" Anti-Theft Rolling Luggage_Black"		The Toursafe 25 rolling duffel's anti-theft features keep your belongings safe and secure so you can focus on new surroundings and not worry about your gear. The Toursafe 25 is also lightweight and roomy for longer trips with a convenient book-style opening so accessing your belongings is quick and easy. A unique drawstring compression casing holds your belongings in place and a zippered mesh pocket in the main compartment stores stray items. There's space for a 15.4â€ laptop in the exterior front zippered pocket with extra places for cables and wires. Smooth rolling wheels and an extendable aluminum handle that locks in place make this semi-collapsible bag easy to handle and there's an EVA molded backing for extra durability. Worry-free travel is the name of the game and the Toursafe 25 is a winner. JETPF402-Blackprnt	"Toursafe 29"" Anti-Theft Rolling Luggage"				Pacsafe	Pacsafe								parent	color								
JETPF402-Black	"Toursafe 29"" Anti-Theft Rolling Luggage_Black"		Sometimes only a large suitcase will do. The Toursafe™ 29â€ bag has all the anti-theft features that Pacsafe is known for and 90 liters of packing space so you can take those recommended down jackets with you on your next ski trip. In spite of the size  its lightweight soft-sided construction is semi-collapsible making it easier to squeeze it into tight spots on the shuttle to your slope-side hotel. Patented eXomesh® slashproof panels are durable guards against rips and tears and puncture resistant ToughZip™ zippers keep malevolent ballpoint pens from surreptitiously opening your bag. A generous main compartment with a unique drawstring compression casing keeps your gear from moving around and a mesh pocket helps to organize it. The front exterior zippered compartment has 3 slip pockets and a mesh zippered pocket to neatly stow travel necessities. Heavy-duty EVA molded backing ads strength. JET60140111-StormGrey	Venturesafe 100 GII Anti-Theft Hip Pack_Pacsafe Storm Grey		We always throw a hip pack in our luggage for an optional hands-free way to carry travel essentials while keeping them close and protected. The added advantage of Venturesafe 100's anti-theft features makes it a good choice. Firstly  eXomesh® slashproof panels on the bottom  side and lower front protect the bag from rips and tears. Then there's a Carrysafe® strap with embedded stainless steel wires that prevents the classic slash-and-run thief from taking off with your pack. JET60260-BLACK	VentureSafe 10L GII 4-Way Backpack_Black		This unique backpack can be worn as a traditional backpack or as a front pack when carrying a larger travel backpack. The long shoulder straps can be worn cross body for a more secure fit and to avoid potential thieves from trying to pull your bag off. The straps also feature Pacsafe® smart buckles  allowing you to detach the strap from the bag to anchor it around a table leg or chair  this stops potential thieves from trying to grab your bag and run off without you noticing. The smart security zippers lock into clips keeping them closed located in the water bottle pocket out of sight and reach  helping to make sure only YOU will be able to get into your bag if you need to make purchases. The main compartment features a unique map printed lining with padded sleeve for a tablet and mesh zip open pocket. The smaller pocket features a RFID blocking pocket to disrupt electronic thieves from stealing your personal information for bank cards or modern passports. Like all Pacsafe® bags  the bag and the shoulder straps features eXo-Mesh stainless steel wiring running throughout to prevent bag slashers from cutting open your bag or cutting your shoulder straps. JET60280-Black	Venturesafe 15L GII Anti-Theft Daypack_Black		Pacsafe's â€œpeace of mindâ€ motto raises the standard for well-constructed travel bags and the Venturesafe daypack is no exception. Gone is the fear that someone is tampering with your bag behind your back in a crowded square or busy market. For starters  exomesh™ panels on the front  sides and bottom of the bag resist knives and blades. Fully padded and adjustable shoulder straps embedded with slash-proof stainless steel wires can be cleverly locked in place with a Turn  lock security hook™ that doubles as a portable safe when you remove the strap to secure the bag to a fixed object. Zippers too are outfitted with a unique locking system that fastens the slider to a hidden clasp to keep pickpockets out. Identity thieves beware; the RDIF blocking front pocket shields the personal data embedded in the RFID chip on your passport  bank cards and credit cards from malicious scanners. The Venturesafe has a roomy main compartment that includes a section for a 3-liter hydration pack and a padded sleeve to protect a 13â€ notebook. What's more  a sternum strap and molded foam back support make this backpack comfortable and easy to wear around town or on the trails. JET60280-Blue	Venturesafe 15L GII Anti-Theft Daypack_Pacsafe Blue		Pacsafe's â€œpeace of mindâ€ motto raises the standard for well-constructed travel bags and the Venturesafe daypack is no exception. Gone is the fear that someone is tampering with your bag behind your back in a crowded square or busy market. For starters  exomesh™ panels on the front  sides and bottom of the bag resist knives and blades. Fully padded and adjustable shoulder straps embedded with slash-proof stainless steel wires can be cleverly locked in place with a Turn  lock security hook™ that doubles as a portable safe when you remove the strap to secure the bag to a fixed object. Zippers too are outfitted with a unique locking system that fastens the slider to a hidden clasp to keep pickpockets out. Identity thieves beware; the RDIF blocking front pocket shields the personal data embedded in the RFID chip on your passport  bank cards and credit cards from malicious scanners. The Venturesafe has a roomy main compartment that includes a section for a 3-liter hydration pack and a padded sleeve to protect a 13â€ notebook. JET60280-NAVY	Venturesafe 15L GII Anti-Theft Daypack_Pacsafe Navy		Pacsafe's â€œpeace of mindâ€ motto raises the standard for well-constructed travel bags and the Venturesafe daypack is no exception. Gone is the fear that someone is tampering with your bag behind your back in a crowded square or busy market. For starters  exomesh™ panels on the front  sides and bottom of the bag resist knives and blades. Fully padded and adjustable shoulder straps embedded with slash-proof stainless steel wires can be cleverly locked in place with a Turn  lock security hook™ that doubles as a portable safe when you remove the strap to secure the bag to a fixed object. Zippers too are outfitted with a unique locking system that fastens the slider to a hidden clasp to keep pickpockets out. Identity thieves beware; the RDIF blocking front pocket shields the personal data embedded in the RFID chip on your passport  bank cards and credit cards from malicious scanners. The Venturesafe has a roomy main compartment that includes a section for a 3-liter hydration pack and a padded sleeve to protect a 13â€ notebook. What's more  a sternum strap and molded foam back support make this backpack comfortable and easy to wear around town or on the trails. JET60200-Beach	Venturesafe 300 GII Anti-Theft Vertical Travel Bag_Beach		The Venturesafe 300's slim vertical design is only slightly larger than a 13â€ laptop yet has plenty of pockets to hold accessories  adapters and chargers. There is exceptional protection for your electronic valuables with Pacsafe's patented anti- theft features. The Slashproof Carrysafe® shoulder strap and eXomesh® slashguard panels embedded in the water repellent nylon resist cuts and tears. A dual release buckle serves as a built-in lock so you can securely attach the bag to any fixed object such as a chair or table. Smart zipper security means unwanted fingers stay out of your belongings with zipper pulls that fasten to concealed clips. And on top of all that  there is an RDIF blocking pocket in the front zippered compartment that shields the RDIF chip on your credit cards and passport from malicious scanners. Additional slots for a phone  pens and keys and two exterior side stretch pockets for a water bottle  umbrella or sunglasses organize all your extras. A molded foam padded back adds comfort and support not only for your back but your digital gear too. You name the gadget  there's a compartment for it. But best of all  the vest's cleverly designed Weight Management System™ evenly distributes the weight of its contents so you don't feel like you're wearing a carry-on bag on your back. The NoBulge™ pocket construction creates a tailored streamlined look that conceals all the goodies tucked inside the pockets. No one could ever guess you're carrying your eyeglasses (with a removable cleaning cloth)  camera (with slot for memory card)  keys  pens  water bottle (held upright with a secure elastic band)  phone  MP3 player (with headphone wires neatly embedded in the lining and pouches in the collar to stow earbuds)  Bluetooth device  Kindle®  books  maps  travel documents  magazines and even an iPad® (with clear touch fabric for touchscreen control). The lightweight mesh lining is breathable for comfort and the soft Teflon® treated shell is stain  wrinkle and water resistant for practicality. Plus you can slide it through airport X-ray screening with the pockets fully loaded! Why rummage for your travel necessities in an annoying bag that slips off your shoulder and needs constant surveillance when you can have immediate access to your goodies in well-designated  secure pockets? No one could ever guess you're carrying your eyeglasses (with a removable cleaning cloth)  camera  keys  pens  water bottle (held upright with a secure elastic band)  phone  MP3 player (with headphone wires neatly embedded in the lining and pouches in the collar to stow earbuds)  Bluetooth device  Kindle®  books  maps  travel documents  magazines and yes  an iPad® (with mesh fabric for touchscreen control). The lightweight mesh lining is breathable for comfort and the soft Teflon® treated shell is stain  wrinkle and water resistant for practicality. Plus you can slide it through airport X-ray screening with the pockets fully loaded! JET192	Lite Line Clothesline		So tiny and compact  you'll take this clothesline with you on all your trips. The Sea to Summit Lite Line is more convenient than a shorter elasticized cord or one with suctions cups that may not hold the weight of all your wet clothes. It can be used anywhere; simply wrap the line around something stationary like a bedpost  chair or tree and loop it back on itself using the plastic hooks on each end to secure it. With 11.6 feet (3.5m) of line  if fits a lot of clothes. Plastic beads are ingenious clothespins that slide along the line to secure each garment in place. The Travel Lite Line folds into a small neoprene pouch that's conveniently attached to the cord so you'll never lose it!    There's no excuse now not to do some quick washes on your trip and pack fewer clothes. The cord is handy at home when spot washing delicates or if you live in an apartment without convenient laundry services close by! Check out Sea to Summit's concentrated Trek  Travel liquid laundry soap too. It's paraben and phosphate free in an airline friendly  leak-proof bottle.    Jet-Setter Tip: Scatter the beads across the cord and wrap it around the palm of your hand until the last few inches before placing it back in its pouch to keep the laundry line from being tangled when not in use.		Sea to Summit	Sea to Summit	9.99	56.485875	CDN	55							"Clothesline measures 11'5"" (3.5m).Dual cord with plastic hooks on each end.Beads hold garments in place.Stows away in the tiny, attached neoprene pouch."					0	https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0918/3750/products/192-litelineclothesline.jpeg?v=1440035228@https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0918/3750/products/192-litelineclothesline_pkg.jpeg?v=1440035228

JETC-BLACK	RFID Card Protector Wallet_Black		This aluminum Card Protector protects up to six cards from bending and breaking while eliminating unauthorized reading of RFID cards (such as smart card  ID card  the latest credit cards and business cards). Slide cards in card protector and with a simple pull on the tab your cards slide out in a convenient layered look for easy selection of card. JET42459-BLACK	Anti-Theft Classic Mini Shoulder Bag_Black		"Stylish and secure - this petite shoulder bag boasts advanced security features designed to keep thieves out and your stuff safe. The material conceals a cable link system at the critical areas of the bag (front  bottom sides and pockets) that prevents bag slashers from cutting open your bag and stealing anything they can grab. The main compartment and front zip open pocket can be locked onto discreet hooks that ensure your bag stays closed and makes it difficult for the bag to be quickly opened by pickpockets. The shoulder strap not only features a concealed cable running through it that stops thieves from cutting the strap and running off with your bag - it also removes on one end with the anti-theft carabineer allowing you to wrap the strap around the leg of a chair or table to enjoy a meal or quick snack without worrying your bag will be a victim of a grab and run. The interior features organizational pockets and an RFID blocking sleeve to protect your electronic information stored on bank cards. There's also a flashlight keychain to help find your items in the dark. JET42224-BLACK	Anti-Theft Cross Body Bag_Black		The classic shoulder bags has been modernized for today's traveler to make sure the gear you left with is the gear you come back with. Smart security zippers found on the front external pockets and main compartment prevent pick pockets from reaching into your bag when you are distracted. The shoulder strap features a hidden cable running through it eliminates bag slashers from cutting the strap and running off with your bag - plus it can be removed at one end allowing you to anchor it around the leg of a table or chair and lock it back into place to prevent thieves form grabbing your bag and running while trying to eat a meal or snack. The material conceals a wire link system in the front  sides  bottom and pockets which prevents thieves from slashing open your bag and trying to grab whatever they can get their hands on. The main compartment can carry an iPad or similar sized tablet  an RFID blocking pocket to keep your personal information safe  and included keyring with a mini flashlight to help you find items in the dark. Two side pockets can hold a water bottle  small umbrella  or sunglasses. JET42457-BLACKprnt	Anti-Theft Essential Classic Purse				Travelon	Travelon								parent	color								
JET42457-BLACK	Anti-Theft Essential Classic Purse_Black		Fashion meets function with the Anti-Theft Classic Purse that not only stores everything you need for a day out - but will also make sure you still have it tomorrow! The petite size can accommodate your wallet  phone  even a mini iPad or similar sized tablet. the interior features an RFID blocking pocket to keep your electronic information secure. The material of the bag is lined with a cable link web that runs along the front  sides  bottom and pockets of the bag to protect your contents from bag slashers looking to cut your bag and steal whatever they can grab. The anti-theft security zippers on the front pocket and main compartment lock closed to discreet hooks making it very difficult for pick pockets to open your bag and steal your stuff. The shoulder strap hides a metal cable that prevents the bag from being cut and stolen by thieves  and it detaches from the bag on one end allowing you to loop the strap around the leg of chair or table and lock it back into place to stop anyone from grabbing your bag and running while you try to eat a meal or snack. The anti-theft security zippers on the front pocket and main compartment lock closed to discreet hooks making it very difficult for pick pockets to open your bag and steal your stuff. The shoulder strap hides a metal cable that prevents the bag from being cut and stolen by thieves  and it detaches from the bag on one end allowing you to loop the strap around the leg of chair or table and lock it back into place to stop anyone from grabbing your bag and running while you try to eat a meal or snack. JET42472 - 05	Anti-Theft Medium Tour Bag_Black		This medium sized messenger bag has enough space to store your daily essentials including your wallet  phone and other small items securely. The critical areas of the bag (pockets  front  bottom and sides) are lined with a Cable Link security web that prevents thieves from cutting open your bag and grabbing whatever falls out. The main compartment and front pocket feature security zippers that lock into a discreet hook to lock the bag closed making it difficult for pickpockets to reach into your bag when you are distracted. The shoulder strap conceals an interior cut proof cable that prevents bag snatchers from cutting the strap of your bag and running off - plus the strap removes at one end allowing you to loop it around the leg of a table and lock it back into place on the bag - thieves won't be able to grab your bag and run off while you try have a snack or eat or a meal. Securely store an iPad® or similar sized tablet in the main compartment that also features an included mini flashlight keychain helps you find your things in the dark. The fold over flap features a zip open pocket and conceals additional pockets with anti-theft zippers and an interior RFID blocking pocket keeps your electronic information safe. JET42584	Anti-Theft N/S Messenger Bag		This rugged messenger bag can help you survive the concrete jungle and anything it throws your way - the Anti-Theft features will ensure your gear makes it to tomorrow. The large main compartment features organizational pockets  an RFID blocking pocket and a dedicated iPad/tablet sleeve pocket that is lined to protect against scratches. There is an expandable side pocket to store a water bottle  and a concealed front pocket can hold your passport  book  or other commonly used items during your day. The rugged material conceals a cable link web along the front  side  bottom and pockets that protects your bag from being cut open by bag slashers that will try to steal whatever falls out. The zippers feature anti-theft clasps that lock them closed making it difficult for pick pockets to easily open your bag and steal the contents. The adjustable shoulder strap has a concealed cable in the material to stop thieves from cutting your strap and running off with the bag  plus it detaches on one end to loop around a chair or table leg and lock it back into place - this stops thieves form trying to run off with your bag when you might be distracted while eating a meal or snack. If you are traveling with an upright rolling suitcase  the Urban Messenger Bag can be attached to the handle using the slip on the back. JET42310-BLACK	Classic Anti-Theft Backpack_Black		This unassuming medium sized classic backpack hides advanced anti-theft features that will protect your items and frustrate any potential thieves trying their luck! The tough fabric hides a lightweight stainless steel cage that is sewn in the fabric at key access points - the front  sides and bottom of the bag - preventing bag slashers from cutting open your bag and running off with whatever they can grab. The lockable anti-theft zippers attach to anchors keeping your bag closed shut. The front zip open pocket features an RFID blocking pocket to prevent the electronic information stored on your bank cards from being lifted by thieves. There is also a stainless steel cable running through the should straps to prevent thieves from cutting the strap and running off with your bag - and your gear! The large main compartment can handle a full day of travel or store everything you need for your daily commute - an iPad® or laptop sleeve stores your device away and leaves plenty of room for a jacket/sweater  reports and so much more! A zip open side pocket can be used to store additional water bottle  umbrella  sunglasses and more.
